nodes.text: Star Wars Mix & Match is a children's activity book that was published on December 18, 2015. The book offers background on the characters from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, and is written by Benjamin Harper and illustrated by UDON artists.

Captain Phasma, Kylo Ren, Poe, Rey, and Finn are featured in this book that blends spectacular action with three-panel pages to create confounding combinations! Mix and match the heads, bodies, and legs more than 200 different ways to create crazy mash-ups between the Resistance and the First Order!

The ability of readers to mix the flaps in various combinations allows readers to create their own versions of material clearly outside the realm of canon. In their original combinations, the flaps present material from the Star Wars: The Force Awakens story, such as "Captain Phasma, in fierce battle armor, wages an attack against the Resistance as the villagers attempt to stop the assault!" However, by mixing the panels, readers can create scenarios such as "Kylo Ren, sinister First Order warrior, makes a living selling scrap metal while leading the forces of evil."
